title: Artificial Intelligence: Revolutionizing Every Aspect of Life - Global Markets Slump Amid AI Concerns and Interest Rate Jitters
description: Artificial Intelligence (AI) is rapidly redefining the way we live, work, and interact. No longer confined to the realm of science fiction, AI is now a driving force behind innovations across all sectors— from healthcare and finance to entertainment and manufacturing. Its impact is far-reaching, transforming industries, reshaping economies, and influencing the way we navigate daily life.
content: Artificial Intelligence (AI) is rapidly redefining the way we live, work, and interact. No longer confined to the realm of science fiction, AI is now a driving force behind innovations across all sectors— from healthcare and finance to entertainment ... [502 chars]

title: Judicious use of Artificial Intelligence can be boon for healthcare: Dr Jitendra
description: Excelsior Correspondent NEW DELHI, Dec 12: Union Minister of State (Independent Charge) for Science & Technology; Minister of State in the Prime Minister’s Office, Personnel, Public Grievances, Pensions, Atomic Energy and Space, Dr. Jitendra Singh today emphasized that judicious use of Artificial Intelligence (AI) can be a boon for healthcare and pharma sectors, while underscoring the government’s strong collaboration with the private sector in emerging biotechnology and gene therapy projects. Addressing the Confederation of Indian Industry (CII) Pharma & Life […]
content:

title: States Set to Defy Trump AI Order, Brace for Legal Fight
description: Despite an executive order from President Donald Trump intended to rein in state-level oversight, states are pressing ahead with their own artificial intelligence regulations — setting the stage for prolonged legal and political clashes that could keep U.S. AI policy fragmented and uncertain absent congressional action.
content: States are moving forward with their own artificial intelligence laws despite President Donald Trump's executive order aimed at curbing state-level regulation, setting up a wave of legal and political battles that could leave U.S. AI rules unsettled ... [2970 chars]

content: Nvidia (NVDA) stock remains in the spotlight amid growing concerns over an artificial intelligence (AI) bubble. The chipmaker’s shares have already surged nearly 35% in 2025, and Wall Street sees another 43% upside over the next twelve months. Nvidia... [2357 chars]

title: Consumer safety report warns of disturbing responses from AI-powered toys
description: New research finds that some toys powered by artificial intelligence directed children to dangerous household items and generated explicit content.
content:
(InvestigateTV) — A new consumer safety report warns parents about the growing market of toys with artificial intelligence, with researchers saying some of these AI toys can deliver unexpected and sometimes disturbing responses to children.
